partner_mode_body1: Anyone can submit a disaster report to Makalamidad.ph
partner_mode_body2: To submit an anonymous disaster report, skip this step!
partner_mode_body3: To submit a report as a partner organization, enter your code below
partner_mode_loginSubHeader: You are submitting a report as:
partner_mode_partnerNotfound: Partner code not found or in inactive status , Kindly check your partner code or email us at bayanihan@mapakalamidad.ph
forgot_partner_body: Hi Makalamidad.ph My name is [enter your name] from [enter your organization]. I have forgotten my partner code and/or I would like to gain access to a Partner Code to be able to report disasters as an official partner representative of Makalamidad.ph ,Thank you.
